title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7322.2 - Reportable incidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7322.2 - Reportable incidents

State Regulations

The following incidents shall be reported to the Commission
pursuant to the requirements of this Part: (a) assaults; (b) sexual abuse; (c) sexual assaults; (d) employee misconduct; (e) communicable reportable
disease; (f) contraband; (g) deaths; (h) escapes; (i) escape attempts; (j) fires; (k) personnel group actions; (l) youth group actions; (m) hostage situations; (n) major disturbances; (o) major maintenance/service
disruptions; (p) natural/civil
emergencies; (q) attempted
suicides; (r) self-inflicted
injuries; and
(s) serious
accidental injuries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7322.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
